com.artemis.managers

Class GroupManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.artemis.BaseSystem
      • com.artemis.managers.GroupManager

  • public class GroupManager
extends BaseSystem
    If you need to group your entities together, e.g tanks going into "units" group or explosions into "effects", then use this manager.

    You must retrieve it using world instance.

    A entity can be assigned to more than one group.

    Author:
    Arni Arent

        Returns:
